questions.question: Which of the following is not a feature of a workspace using good style?
options: Clearly defined sections or components of a workspace
Quick navigation to a specified section or particular transformer
Easily passed to another user for editing
Explanatory titles so the user knows what the workspace does

questions.question: All FME users must align the tops of objects on the canvas.
Both the grid and guides are enabled by default.
Autolayout might not perfectly layout your workspace every time, but it can help you get started with tidying up your workspace.
